meta.description: HubSpot integration automates tasks like lead management, contacts syncing, reporting, and customer support across platforms.

options.label: Contact
options.description: Create, update, search, or manage individual contacts, including their personal and business information, within your HubSpot CRM.

options.label: Company
options.description: Add, update, or retrieve company records to organize and track businesses and their associated contacts in HubSpot.

options.label: Lead
options.description: Manage potential customers by creating, updating, or tracking leads as they move through your sales funnel.

options.label: Tickets
options.description: Create, update, or manage customer support tickets to track and resolve service requests efficiently.

options.label: Line Items
options.description: Add or modify individual products or services associated with deals, enabling detailed sales tracking.

options.label: Products
options.description: Manage your product catalog by creating, updating, or retrieving product details for use in deals and quotes.

options.label: Deals
options.description: Create, update, or search for sales deals to monitor opportunities and revenue in your sales pipeline.

options.label: Forms
options.description: Submit, update, or manage form submissions to capture leads and gather information from your website or campaigns.

options.label: Owners
options.description: Retrieve owner information to manage responsibility for records such as contacts and deals.

options.label: Pipelines
options.description: Create, update, or manage sales or service pipelines to organize and track the progress of deals or tickets.

options.label: Calls
options.description: Handles the creation, retrieval, updating, and management of call records and related activities within HubSpot.

meta.description: Select the resource you want to work with.
